import React, { useState } from 'react' import s from './categories.module.scss' import $ from 'jquery' import CategoriesCarousel from './CategoriesCarousel' export default function Categories() { const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState('escorts'); const activateBtn = category => { setFilterCategory(category); } return (

SELECT A CATEGORY

activateBtn("escorts")} className={`${s.category} ${filterCategory === 'escorts' ? 'active_btn_blue' : ''}`}> ESCORTS activateBtn("trans")} className={`${s.category} ${filterCategory === 'trans' ? 'active_btn_blue' : ''}`}> TRANS activateBtn("bdsm")} className={`${s.category} ${filterCategory === 'bdsm' ? 'active_btn_blue' : ''}`}> MASSAGE activateBtn("fetish")} className={`${s.category} ${filterCategory === 'fetish' ? 'active_btn_blue' : ''}`}> FETISH activateBtn("dancers")} className={`${s.category} ${filterCategory === 'dancers' ? 'active_btn_blue' : ''}`}> DANCERS
